textBeforeTable: Summer Session 2015 Registration and Refund Calendar, June 5 - July 31 The full tuition balance or appropriate financial aid documentation is due at the Office of Student Accounts by the Friday before the first day of the summer session. Payments must be received (not just postmarked) by the deadline. Failure to complete this step by the deadline will result in a $150.00 late registration fee. Tuition Payment To register for a Summer Study Abroad course, you must first apply to the Summer Study Abroad program of your choice. If admitted to the program, you will then be automatically registered for your selected courses. Please contact Graduate and International Programs at (619) 260-4596 or llminfo@sandiego.edu with questions. USD Law—Summer Study Abroad Courses, clinics, internships and externships with insufficient enrollment by May 1, 2015 are subject to cancellation.  Agency internships for 1-3 credits will be available at various starting and stopping dates during the summer. Students interested in summer agency internships should contact lawinternships@sandiego.edu for complete agency internship information. USD Law—Summer Agency Internships LLM and MSLS students only: All LLM and MSLS students must meet with Assistant Director of Graduate and International Programs Jacqueline Eggert prior to registering for classes. Please contact Graduate and International Programs at (619) 260-4596 or llminfo@sandiego.edu to schedule an appointment. Web Registration for Summer courses will be unavailable between Thursday, April 30 at 12 a.m. and Sunday, May 17 at 11:59 p.m. to observe the Spring 2015 final exam period.
